DOC.criteria: adult age 18 50 year prebronchodilator FEV1 > 80 % predict evidence reversibility follow administration bronchodilator history allergy medical history consistent atopy and/or asthma positive response allergy skin test inhalant allergen ( define wheal > 3 mm large negative control ) prebronchodilator FEV1 < 80 % predict > 12 % reversibility FEV1 follow administration bronchodilator history significant chronic illness history respiratory infection within past 2 week use prescription medication oral contraceptive thyroid hormone replacement within past 2 month use investigational medication within past month
